text: Hi good morning from México City
Which would be the right channel to ask a question about cache ?
I’ve been making some changes to one of my templates, and in  preview from de design manager I can see my changes after published, but in the pages are not being reflected

It sounds like you may be updating a custom module, and the changes are not showing on the page. Generally this is because you need to go into the module on the page and update the new fields you just added. They don't have default content in them and this could be causing this issue.

If your situation is different, please try to describe exactly what is going on here, what you are doing, so that we can help
